entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Carman

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
